meanings.definition: Engraved or impressed deeply into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The etched design on the glass vase was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist created an etched image on the metal plate.
meanings.sent3: The etched pattern on the tree bark made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her words left an etched memory in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The etched initials on the tree trunk marked their love forever.

meanings.definition: Made by or as if by etching.
meanings.sent1: The etched lines on the paper added a unique texture.
meanings.sent2: The etched design on the mirror reflected light beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The etched drawing on the wall seemed to come to life at night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left an etched impression on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The etched patterns on the pottery showcased the artist's skill.

meanings.sent1: The etched instructions on the map were easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: His goals were etched clearly in his mind.
meanings.sent3: The etched boundaries between the two properties caused confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was etched in every line of her face.
meanings.sent5: The etched details in the painting brought it to life.
